description: Returns information about an on-premises storage system that you're using with DataSync Discovery.

parameters.name: StorageSystemArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an on-premises storage system that you're using with DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: StorageSystemArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the on-premises storage system that the discovery job looked at.

nested_items.name: ServerConfiguration
nested_items.description: The server name and network port required to connect with your on-premises storage system's management interface.

nested_items.name: ServerHostname
nested_items.description: The domain name or IP address of your storage system's management interface.

nested_items.name: ServerPort
nested_items.description: The network port for accessing the storage system's management interface.

nested_items.name: SystemType
nested_items.description: The type of on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: AgentArns
nested_items.description: The ARN of the DataSync agent that connects to and reads from your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name that you gave your on-premises storage system when adding it to DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: Describes the connectivity error that the DataSync agent is encountering with your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: ConnectivityStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether your DataSync agent can connect to your on-premises storage system.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch log group that's used to monitor and log discovery job events.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when you added the on-premises storage system to DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the secret that stores your on-premises storage system's credentials. DataSync Discovery stores these credentials in Secrets Manager.
